phrases.usage: Use this phrase to express a strong preference for a specific movie genre during a discussion.
phrases.example: I really enjoy psychological thrillers because they challenge the viewer, so I find them very stimulating.

phrases.usage: Use this to introduce a logical explanation for your preference or opinion.
phrases.example: The reason is that the cinematography is stunning, so it enhances the overall viewing experience.

phrases.text: I'm not a big fan of ...
phrases.usage: Use this professional expression to indicate a lack of interest in a particular category or style.
phrases.example: I'm not a big fan of slapstick comedy because I prefer witty dialogue, so I usually avoid those films.

phrases.text: I see what you mean, but...
phrases.usage: Use this to acknowledge another person's viewpoint before presenting a contrasting academic opinion.
phrases.example: I see what you mean, but the narrative is quite predictable, so I would like to explore other options.

phrases.usage: Use this to propose an alternative movie choice when you disagree with the current suggestion.
phrases.example: How about we watch a biography instead? It illustrates a real person's life, so it is more educational.

phrases.usage: Use this when you want to suggest a middle ground that satisfies the interests of all participants.
phrases.example: We could compromise by watching an animated feature because it is visually impressive, so we both might like it.

phrases.usage: Use this to indicate your formal agreement with a proposed plan or movie selection.
phrases.example: That works for me because the director is highly acclaimed, so I am certain the quality will be excellent.

keyVocabulary.definition: A specific category of artistic composition, such as a movie, characterized by similarities in style or subject matter.
The sequence of connected events that form a story within a film.
The art and technique of motion-picture photography, including lighting and camera choice.
A particular attitude toward or way of regarding something; a point of view.
A general agreement reached by a group of people during a discussion.
